name: order-template
description: Module to show the order template lines

className.description: Provide a custom css class name defined in the theme pack to target the CSS for this module

itemsPerPage.description: Number of items to be displayed per page

emptyOrderTemplateLinesText.comment: Text for the empty order template lines
emptyOrderTemplateLinesText.value: Your order template lines is empty.

priceFree.comment: Text to show when product is free

addOrderTemplateItemToBagButtonText.comment: Text for the add to bag button

addSelectedToBagButtonText.comment: Text for the add to bag button

removeSelectedToBagButtonText.comment: Text for the add to bag button

waitingClass.comment: CSS class for the waiting class

addedToCartFailureMessage.comment: Message to show when add to cart fails
addedToCartFailureMessage.value: Add to cart failed. Please refresh and retry

maxQuantityLimitText.comment: String to show message that you've reached max quantity
maxQuantityLimitText.value: You already have {curQuantity} of this item in your shopping bag. You can only add {maxQuantity} of this item to your shopping bag

originalPriceText.comment: String that corresponds to the original price screen reader text

currentPriceText.comment: String that corresponds to the current price screen reader text

productDimensionTypeColor.comment: String that corresponds to the Color Product Dimension Type (1)

productDimensionTypeConfiguration.comment: String that corresponds to the Configuration Product Dimension Type (2)

productDimensionTypeSize.comment: String that corresponds to the Size Product Dimension Type (3)

productDimensionTypeStyle.comment: String that corresponds to the Style Product Dimension Type (4)

errorGettingOrderTemplateLines.comment: Text for the error message while getting order template lines
errorGettingOrderTemplateLines.value: Sorry we are unable to load your order template lines at this moment, please try again later.

productNumberText.comment: Name of the product number column of the product table

productText.comment: Name of the product column of the product table

productUnitPriceText.comment: Name of the product unit price column of the product table

productUOMText.comment: Text for the unit of measure column of the product table

productQuantityText.comment: Text for the quantity column of the product table

productActionsText.comment: Text for the actions column of the product table

addTemplateToBagButtonText.comment: Text for the add template to bag button

addLineModalLinkText.comment: Text for the add a line modal link

addItemToTemplateText.comment: Text for the add a line to the template button

searchModalPlaceholderText.comment: Placeholder text for the add to template modal
searchModalPlaceholderText.value: Enter a product name or SKU#

selectProductButtonText.comment: Text for the select product for configuration button

backButtonText.comment: Text for the back to products button

deleteTemplateButtonText.comment: Text for the delete template button

orderTemplateTitle.comment: Text for order template dialog title

renameTemplateButtonText.comment: Text for the rename template button

renameOrderTemplateTitleText.comment: Text for title of the rename template dialog

renameOrderTemplateButtonText.comment: Text for rename order template dialog button

inputQuantityAriaLabel.comment: Aria label for the input quantity

decrementButtonAriaLabel.comment: Aria label for the quantity decrease button
decrementButtonAriaLabel.value: Press to decrease the quantity by 1

incrementButtonAriaLabel.comment: Aria label for the quantity increment button

addToCartFailureMessage.comment: Message to show when order template adding to cart have fails
addToCartFailureMessage.value: Add to cart failed. Please refresh and retry

addToCartSuccessMessage.comment: Message to show when order template successfully added to cart
addToCartSuccessMessage.value: Order template successfully added to cart

addToCartProcessMessage.comment: Message to show when order template adding to cart

removeSelectedSuccessMessage.comment: Message to show when order template successfully added to cart
removeSelectedSuccessMessage.value: Selected lines successfully removed to cart

removeSelectedFailureMessage.comment: Message to show when order template successfully added to cart
removeSelectedFailureMessage.value: Failed to remove selected lines, please try again

closeWindowButtonText.comment: Text for the close modal window button of adding order template

deleteOrderTemplateFailedText.comment: Text for the failure in deleting order template

viewCartButtonText.comment: View cart text on item added to cart dialog

orderTemplateCloseButtonText.comment: Text for the close button for order template Dialog

linesAddedToCartHeaderItemsOneText.comment: View order template text on cart added to cart dialog

linesAddedToCartHeaderLinesOneText.comment: View order template text on cart added to cart dialog

linesAddedToCartHeaderLinesFormatText.comment: View order template text on cart added to cart dialog

linesAddedToCartHeaderMessageText.comment: View order template text on cart added to cart dialog

itemAddedToCartHeaderItemOneText.comment: View order template text on item added to cart dialog

itemAddedToCartHeaderItemFormatText.comment: View order template text on item added to order template dialog

itemAddedToCartHeaderMessageText.comment: View order template text on item added to cart dialog

freePriceText.comment: View order template text on item added to cart dialog

quantitySelectLabel.comment: Text label for the quantity form control

searchErrorMessage.comment: Text message for a search API request error

notFoundSearchErrorRedediation.comment: Text message for empty search results

notFoundSearchErrorNotice.comment: Text message for remediating an empty search query

addLineProductUnitPricePrefix.comment: Text prefix for a product's unit price

addLineProductUnitOfMeasurePrefix.comment: Text prefix for a product's unit price

searchButtonAriaLabel.comment: Aria label for product search submit button

searchInputAriaLabel.comment: Aria label for product search query field

searchResultsCountVerbage.comment: Notification message of number of search results
searchResultsCountVerbage.value: We found {count} {subject} based on your search.

searchResultsCountSubject.comment: Notification message subject term, allows for pluralization

addToTemplateConfirmation.comment: Confirmation of products added to the order template
addToTemplateConfirmation.value: {count} of {productAndDimensions} have been added to template.

addToTemplateError.comment: Error message for API error when products added to the order template
addToTemplateError.value: There was an error adding this item to the template.

totalPriceLabel.comment: Text label for total price of configured product
